dagProcessingLogs.description: (Optional) Log configuration options for processing DAGs. See Module logging configuration for more information. Disabled by default.

schedulerLogs.description: Log configuration options for the schedulers. See Module logging configuration for more information. Disabled by default.

taskLogs.description: Log configuration options for DAG tasks. See Module logging configuration for more information. Enabled by default with `INFO` log level.

webserverLogs.description: Log configuration options for the webservers. See Module logging configuration for more information. Disabled by default.

workerLogs.description: Log configuration options for the workers. See Module logging configuration for more information. Disabled by default.
